snippet: Russian authorities detained at least 61 people on Friday for holding unauthorized protests, underscoring the government’s efforts to stifle dissent.
abstract: Russian authorities detain at least 61 people from St Petersburg to the Caucasus for holding unauthorized protests ahead of the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics in Sochi.
lead_paragraph: Russian authorities detained at least 61 people on Friday for holding unauthorized protests, underscoring the government’s efforts to stifle dissent.

headline.main: Scores Detained in Russia Before Olympic Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Scores Detained in Russia Before Olympic Ceremony
